org.apache.cassandra.utils

Class TestRateLimiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.byteman.rule.helper.Helper
      • org.apache.cassandra.utils.TestRateLimiter

  • public class TestRateLimiter
extends org.jboss.byteman.rule.helper.Helper
    Helper class to apply rate limiting during fault injection testing; for an example script, see test/resources/byteman/mutation_limiter.btm.

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        public void acquire(double rate)
        Acquires a single unit at the given rate. If the rate changes between calls, a new rate limiter is created and the old one is discarded.
